description.value: A mixture of metal shavings and flash powder inside this small, mirrored sphere ignites when disturbed, causing the ball to flash and spin. When a creature enters the square, the ball pops into the air, and all creatures within 10 feet who can see the mirror ball must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round. On a critical failure, affected creatures are instead dazzled for 1 minute.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
